# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a component that makes an entity aware of certain aspects of the physical environment.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializing a scene-understanding component

- **init(entityType:)**: Creates a component for the given entity type that makes an entity aware of certain aspects of the physical environment.

items.description: Creates a component for the given entity type that makes an entity aware of certain aspects of the physical environment.
